decks.notes: The key strategy of this Esper Control deck is to maximize its control over the game by utilizing cards that remove threats and disrupt opponents' plans. The deck focuses on generating card advantage and board control through cards like Skyclave Apparition, Extinction Event, and Doom Foretold. It also aims to generate additional value with Yorion, Sky Nomad by flickering permanents and triggering their enter-the-battlefield effects. The deck has a flexible mana base with various dual lands and Fabled Passage to ensure consistent access to all three colors.

The main concept of the deck is to apply pressure on the opponent early in the game with efficient creatures and pump effects. It focuses on playing high-impact threats like Questing Beast and Embercleave to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The deck includes removal options like Bonecrusher Giant and Embereth Shieldbreaker to deal with opposing threats. The Great Henge provides card advantage and additional power, while cards like Shatterskull Smashing and Primal Might can help clear the way for attacks or finish off opponents. Overall, the deck aims to be fast and aggressive in order to close out games quickly.

Utilize a combination of mill effects and aggressive creatures to disrupt your opponent's strategy while dealing damage quickly. Take advantage of cards like Ruin Crab and Thieves' Guild Enforcer to mill your opponent's deck, while using powerful spells like Into the Story and Drown in the Loch to control the board. Zareth San, the Trickster can steal key cards from your opponent's graveyard, giving you an advantage. Make sure to balance aggression with control elements to dominate your opponent in Standard 1 vs 1 matches.

This deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence with efficient, aggressive creatures like Lovestruck Beast and Feasting Troll King. The mana acceleration provided by cards like Gilded Goose and Tangled Florahedron allows for early plays of powerful threats like The Great Henge and Kogla, the Titan Ape. The deck also utilizes cards like Trail of Crumbs and Witch's Oven for card advantage and interaction with Feasting Troll King. With a backup plan of using Crawling Barrens as a mana sink, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big creatures and high power plays.

This Esper Control deck focuses on utilizing Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion to maximize value from entering the battlefield triggers. The deck aims to control the game through a variety of removal spells such as Skyclave Apparition, Heartless Act, and Eliminate, while also utilizing Doom Foretold, Elspeth Conquers Death, and Dance of the Manse for incremental advantage. The deck also includes card draw and selection with cards like Omen of the Sea and Mazemind Tome. The mana base is built to support the three-color requirements of the deck while providing consistency in casting spells.

The main concept of this Gruul Aggro deck is to flood the board with efficient and aggressive creatures like Brushfire Elemental, Bonecrusher Giant, and Questing Beast. The deck aims to apply constant pressure on the opponent by playing threats early and often, while also utilizing cards like Embercleave and The Great Henge to maximize damage output. With a strong curve and powerful finishers, the deck looks to overwhelm opponents quickly and close out games before they have a chance to stabilize. Game plan is to go wide and swing big.

The deck focuses on aggressive play, aiming to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and pump spells. The key strategy is to establish a strong board presence early on with efficient creatures like Lovestruck Beast and Bonecrusher Giant, while using Embercleave and Shatterskull Smashing to deal massive damage and finish off the opponent. The inclusion of cards like The Great Henge and Edgewall Innkeeper help in card advantage and ramping up mana for bigger plays. By staying on the offensive and applying pressure, the deck aims to win the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using powerful green creatures like Feasting Troll King, Wicked Wolf, and Kogla, the Titan Ape. The deck includes various ramp and card advantage tools such as Gilded Goose, Kazandu Mammoth, and The Great Henge to keep the pressure on and maintain board presence. Additionally, the deck includes some removal options like Thrashing Brontodon and Witch's Oven to handle threats from the opponent. The deck aims to establish a strong board presence early and leverage that advantage to secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this Gruul Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful and efficient creatures, while also utilizing synergy between creatures like Edgewall Innkeeper and Lovestruck Beast. The deck aims to quickly build a board presence, using cards like Questing Beast and Brushfire Elemental to deal large amounts of damage to the opponent. The inclusion of The Great Henge provides additional card advantage and life gain, while Embercleave acts as a powerful finisher. Overall, the deck prioritizes aggressive plays and tempo advantage to secure victory.

This Gruul Aggro deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful combat tricks. Using efficient creatures like Questing Beast and Brushfire Elemental, along with removal spells like Bonecrusher Giant and Embereth Shieldbreaker, the deck looks to establish a strong board presence early on. The inclusion of cards like The Great Henge and Embercleave provide additional combat capabilities and card advantage, while cards like Shatterskull Smashing and Primal Might offer versatility in dealing with threats. Overall, this deck focuses on fast, aggressive plays to control the battlefield and secure a quick victory.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on playing powerful creatures quickly and efficiently to overwhelm your opponent. With a mix of aggressive creatures like Brushfire Elemental and Bonecrusher Giant, along with powerful spells like Embercleave and Shatterskull Smashing, this deck aims to put pressure on your opponent early and often. Cards like Questing Beast and The Great Henge provide additional value and card advantage, while cards like Scavenging Ooze and Embereth Shieldbreaker help disrupt your opponent's game plan. Overall, this deck aims to be fast, aggressive, and versatile in dealing with various threats.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and powerful combat tricks to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal massive damage. With a mix of efficient creatures like Bonecrusher Giant and Lovestruck Beast, as well as high-impact cards like Embercleave and The Great Henge, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain that pressure throughout the game. By utilizing the Gruul color combination, the deck is able to combine efficient creatures with powerful combat tricks to create a fast-paced and aggressive strategy.

This deck focuses on quickly playing aggressive creatures and using powerful enchantments like The Great Henge and Embercleave to enhance their abilities and deal massive amounts of damage to the opponent. It includes a mix of creatures with strong abilities and efficient combat stats, along with versatile planeswalkers like Garruk, Unleashed and Vivien, Monsters' Advocate. The deck also includes cards like Shatterskull Smashing and Embereth Shieldbreaker to deal with opponent's threats and keep the pressure up on the battlefield. Overall, the strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and powerful offense.

This deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with efficient, aggressive creatures in order to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. The key strategy is to ramp up mana with cards like Gilded Goose and Tangled Florahedron to play big threats like Feasting Troll King and Kogla, the Titan Ape. The deck also includes card advantage engines like Trail of Crumbs and The Great Henge to maintain resources and keep the pressure on the opponent. Overall, the deck aims to win through early aggression and efficient card advantage.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful synergies. By utilizing cards like Lovestruck Beast and Wicked Wolf alongside The Great Henge and Trail of Crumbs for card advantage, the deck aims to quickly build a strong board presence and outvalue the opponent. With a good mix of creatures, ramp, and removal, this Mono Green Aggro deck is designed to apply constant pressure and maintain board control throughout the game.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using powerful green creatures and efficient ramp cards. The deck focuses on deploying threats quickly, generating advantage through card draw and mana acceleration, and maintaining a strong board presence with cards like Feasting Troll King, Wicked Wolf, and The Great Henge. The inclusion of cards like Trail of Crumbs and Castle Garenbrig further support the deck's strategy of generating card advantage and accelerating mana production, allowing the player to outpace their opponent and secure victory.
